features.additionalInfo: See, track and easily pay your bills online in NetBank or on the go in the CommBank app.
Wherever you are in the world, CommBank gives you the choice and control to securely manage all of your accounts on a range of devices, the way you want.
Whether you have a savings goal in mind or want to build a buffer for those 'just in case' moments, Goal Tracker in the CommBank app helps you set and reach your goals.

The first staff assisted or telephone banking withdrawals when using an operator (including cheques issued on your account and cashed over-the-counter at a CommBank branch) are free. Every additional staff assisted withdrawal will have a charge of $3.00 each.

eligibility.additionalInfo: For customers wanting to apply online, they will require an Australian residential address.

fees.name: Paper Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged when you ask us to give you an additional account statement outside the standard cycle. A fee charged when you ask us to issue past statements, or ordered statements.

fees.name: Paper Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fees do not apply for statements issued as per the standard statement frequency.

fees.name: Staff assisted withdrawals

discounts.description: You may qualify for a waiver of assisted withdrawal fees if

eligibility.additionalInfo: We will waive 1 assisted withdrawal fee per month (not available through ATM, EFTPOS, Agency, Cheque withdrawals).

discounts.description: You may qualify for a waiver of assisted withdrawal fees if

eligibility.additionalInfo: Your Australian Age, Service or Disability Pension is directly credited to your account, then we'll waive 2 extra assisted withdrawal fees each month.

fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged on some accounts when you take money out: At a CommBank branch, a post office, agency, with telephone banking if using an operator or by cashing a cheque.

depositRates.additionalInfo: The standard variable rate applies if the bonus conditions are not met. The standard variable credit interest rate is paid on your entire account balance.

depositRates.additionalValue: We pay bonus interest on top of the standard variable credit interest rate on credit balances if you: 1) Make at least one deposit each calendar month into your account; and 2) Have a higher account balance at the end of the month compared to the account balance at the start of the month (excluding interest and bank-initiated transactions). One variable bonus interest rate applies to your entire balance. The interest rate depends on how much you have in your account.

One variable bonus interest rate applies to your entire balance. The interest rate depends on how much you have in your account.

One variable bonus interest rate applies to your entire balance. The interest rate depends on how much you have in your account.

data.name: GoalSaver
data.description: Be rewarded with a variable bonus interest rate for saving regularly each month.
